name: pulsar-ide-biome
description: Pulsar integration with Biome, the JS/TS/JSON/CSS formatter and linter

formatOnSave.title: Format on save
formatOnSave.description:
Whether to reformat code when a buffer is saved. Will only reformat if your Biome config file [has formatting enabled](https://biomejs.dev/reference/configuration/#formatterenabled).

This is a built-in behavior; **do not** need a code formatting package (like `atom-ide-code-format`) to enable this behavior.

enable.title: Enable
enable.description: Whether to show diagnostic messages via the `linter` package. (To change this setting for a specific kind of file, use a scoped setting.) Requires [linter](https://web.pulsar-edit.dev/packages/linter) and [linter-ui-default](https://web.pulsar-edit.dev/packages/linter-ui-default) (or equivalent packages).

includeMessageCodeInMessageBody.title: Include Message Code in Message Body
includeMessageCodeInMessageBody.description: When enabled, will include the code for a linter message at the end of its body.

enable.title: Enable Debug Logging
enable.description: Whether to show debug logging in the developer tools console. May be useful when reporting issues.
